title: The Deepest Color of the Night - Novel Updates
tags: Betrayal   Boss-Subordinate Relationship   Calm Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Past Plays a Big Role   Past Trauma   R*pe Victim Becomes Lover   Revenge   R*pe
author: Huai Shang   淮上
description:
“I spent all these years just to stand in front of you again.

I just want to say that I deeply miss you. 

Do you?“

After in exile for four years , Gu Yuan finally came back and wanted to continue his love with Fang Jin who was also his father’s secret lover.>
